news: Amkor Technology stock forecast sentiment is bullish with 26 technical indicators signaling bullish signals and none bearish. The stock is trading at 15.2% above the 5-day forecast.
DA Davidson maintained a Buy rating on Amkor and raised its price target from $30 to $40, citing strong fundamentals and growth prospects in semiconductor packaging.
Amkor Technology fell more steeply than the broader market; investors advised to monitor upcoming earnings for clarity.
Amkor stock rose 5.3% on positive investor attention due to strong demand in advanced packaging and AI-related semiconductor trends.
